home.description: Nice to meet you. I'm a full-stack software developer and I'm excited to tell you all about it! Whether you need a brand new product, a cool new feature, or an awesome new website, I've got you covered. I've got a whole bunch of experience under my belt and I'd love for you to take a look at some of my work. If you like what you see and you've got a project that needs to be coded up, don't hesitate to reach out! Let's create something amazing together.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Exciting news! I've been working on several projects, and some of them are already up and running! You can check out the live versions and even explore the source code. But wait, there's more! I've got some amazing projects in the works that are still being deployed, so you'll get a sneak peek of the source code for now, but keep an eye out for their live demos coming soon!

about.description: Hey, I'm Pamphile Musonda - a full-stack web developer by day and a boxing champ by...well, whenever I have time. I like to think my right hook is as strong as my coding skills. When I'm not throwing punches in the ring, I enjoy playing chess and working out. I'm also a bookworm who loves to read and discover new ideas. I'm serious about my work, but don't worry - I won't make you put on gloves and spar with me. Let's team up and create something awesome!
about.last-description: Want to reach out to me? My inbox is always open, and I'm working on an exciting project that I'll announce soon. Drop me a line with your questions or just to say hello, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
